Method Detail

isValidPortNumber

public static boolean isValidPortNumber(int port)
Tells whether or not a given integer is in the range of valid port numbers.

Parameters:
port - A port number.
Returns:
Returns true if the given integer falls in the range 32768-61000 inclusive.

isValidHostname

public static boolean isValidHostname(java.lang.String hostname)
Returns true if the given host-name is valid, false otherwise. A valid host-name consists of up to 127 levels, each containing up to 63 characters. The allowed characters are a-z, 0-9, period (.) and dash (-). However, dash and period cannot be at the beginning or end of any of the parts of the domain name. The full domain name may not exceed 253 characters. Source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domain_name#Parts_of_a_domain_name

Parameters:
hostname - A hostname String.
Returns:
Whether or not the hostname is valid.

isValidProfileName

public static boolean isValidProfileName(java.lang.String profileName)
Returns true if the given profile name is valid, false otherwise. It is in valid if the string is empty or contains a semi-colon.

Parameters:
profileName - A profile name String.
Returns:
Whether or not the profile name is valid.
